answer:
There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC. If you need a copy of your immunization records, you will find tips for locating them here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC.


## If you need a copy of your immunization records, you will find tips for locating them here.

question: Hello, I need to try to obtain my MMR vaccination records for work but the Doctor I was vaccinated by in Vancouver has passed away since. Is there a way for me to still get these records?
question_variation_0: how many records does a dr need to obtain for mmr
question_variation_1: does doctor pass away after vaccine records
question_variation_2: how to get mmr vaccination records
